biotools.summary: A fast C++ implementation for computing various graph kernels including (1) simple kernels between vertex and/or edge label histograms, (2) graphlet kernels, (3) random walk kernels (popular baselines), and (4) the Weisfeiler-Lehman graph kernel (state-of-the-art).

bioschemas.name: graphkernels
bioschemas.summary: A fast C++ implementation for computing various graph kernels including (1) simple kernels between vertex and/or edge label histograms, (2) graphlet kernels, (3) random walk kernels (popular baselines), and (4) the Weisfeiler-Lehman graph kernel (state-of-the-art).
